uk.org.taverna.scufl2.validation

Interface ValidationReport

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CorrectnessValidationListener, StructuralValidationListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCorrectnessValidationListener, DefaultStructuralValidationListener, ReportCorrectnessValidationListener, ReportStructuralValidationListener

    public interface ValidationReport

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean detectedProblems() 
      ValidationException getException() 

    • Method Detail

      • detectedProblems

        boolean detectedProblems()
        Returns:
        Whether any problems were detected during the validation.

      • getException

        ValidationException getException()
        Returns:
        An exception to throw to report the problems, or null if there are no problems to report.
